name: JURONG PRIMARY SCHOOL
mrt: Lakeside MRT Station, Jurong East MRT Station

GeneralInformation.School Vision: A vibrant community of gracious citizens and passionate learners
GeneralInformation.School Mission: We nurture all-rounded pupils of grace, distinction and sound moral values,ready to take on future endeavours.
GeneralInformation.School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: JPS has a long-standing tradition, being around in the community for more than half a decade.    The 5 Core Values of the school are: Respect, Integrity, Care, Responsibility and Passion.  We aim to nurture the whole child, laying a strong foundation in order to prepare them for a future which can be complex and uncertain.  We believe in life-long learning for both our staff and students.  We work closely with the community to provide our students with the opportunities to contribute to the society and also platforms to showcase their talents.   We seek to develop in our children the 5 domains of cognitive, aesthetics, moral, physical and social.
GeneralInformation.Type of School: GOVERNMENT SCHOOL / CO-ED SCHOOL / SINGLE SESSION

School Distinctive Programmes.Music & Performing Arts: ECLIP (Every Child Leads in Instrumental Performance)

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: JPS is committed to giving each child a broad and deep foundation for a lifelong journey of learning.  Holistic education is about nurturing the whole child, developing in our children an enduring core of skills, dispositions and competencies, steeped in values and character, to enable them to thrive in the future workplace, and more importantly, lead purposeful and meaningful lives.  JPS has been awarded the Learning for Life Programme (LLP) status in Music and Performing Arts with our special programme known as the ECLIP (Every Child Leads in Instrumental Performance).  Through  this programme, not only will the students learn to appreciate, create and love music, but also develop in them other competencies and values in life.   Through music, we strive also to build in all our students leadership competencies.  To this end, we have embarked on a programme called Leader In Me programme which utilizes the 7 Habits of Highly Effective People.  Our overseas immersion programes also help our students to sensitize them to the world around them.
